Title: Relates to the recycling of lead-acid batteries by removing the cap on the incentive payment charged by retailers of such batteries
Summary: Relates to the recycling of lead-acid batteries by removing the cap on the incentive payment charged by retailers of such batteries.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-1701, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the recycling of lead-acid batteries
